summary: The customer was looking for a fast and reliable internet connection that won't break the bank. The agent provided the customer with two options - a 100 Mbps plan for $49.99 per month plus taxes and fees, and a 200 Mbps plan for $69.99 per month plus taxes and fees. The customer was offered a promotional offer on the 200 Mbps plan, which includes three months free and the fourth month at half price. The customer decided to sign up online, and was informed that a technician would come to install their modem and router. Installation fees may apply depending on the customer's location.
